title: Will FFVII Remake 2 Sell as Well as FFVII Remake? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.22.20
description:
Greg and Tim go over April's INSANE NPD numbers and talk about Final Fantasy VII Remake's success. 

Time Stamps - 
 00:05:00 - Housekeeping
REMEMBER: We’re doing a Core Game Jam - kindafunny.com/gamejam - $100 gets donated to Extra Life for every game submitted. To enter, publish a new game on the Core platform in one of four categories: party game, (kinda) funniest game, retro game, and pop-culture inspired game. There’s $5k in prizes, head to kindafunny.com/gamejam
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black JackAl Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:09:10 - April 2020 NPD Numbers are Insane, Jeff Grubb @ venturebeat
GAMES
00:25:00 - Ghost of Tsushima Update, Dorno @ IGN
00:29:20 - As a Sekiro fan, i'm excited to hear that it will be difficult and grounded. You take a couple hits, you're dead. But, for people like yourselves who aren't fans of hyper difficult gameplay like a Soulsborne or Sekiro game, does this turn you off of the game?  - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:34:15 - Maneater Review Round-Up
00:39:12 - Summer Games Fest has two more showcases!
00:45:08 - Naughty Dog Using Twitter’s New Feature to Fight Spoilers, Matt Kim @ IGN
00:44:20 -  Brooklinen
00:45:30 -  Express VPN
00:47:08 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:50:05 - The Kingdom Hearts TV series is reportedly in development and may be a show for Disney +. I just wanna know, Kingdom Hearts expert Tim, is how much of a dumpster trash fire you think this will be? - The Nano Biologis
00:52:48 - What games from the PS4/Xbox One era do you feel are must-play? - Michael Kennedy Gauthier
00:54:45 - Squad Up: Frankfurtter(Life)
00:55:50 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: We’re off
TUESDAY: Greg and Adam Kovic
WEDNESDAY: Blessing and Alanah
THURSDAY: Blessing and Adam Kovic
FRIDAY: Greg and Alanah
